supply_demand_balancer.name: Supply-Demand Balancer
supply_demand_balancer.description: Analyzes supply and demand patterns, identifies shortages, and notifies providers

org_sync_agent.name: Organization Sync Agent
org_sync_agent.description: Syncs organization data and creates urgent needs based on capacity and shortages

volunteer_match_agent.name: Volunteer Match Agent
volunteer_match_agent.description: Matches volunteers to seekers based on skills and proximity

event_analysis_agent.name: Event Analysis Agent
event_analysis_agent.description: Analyzes events and generates posts for volunteer opportunities
